The oldest scriptures to ever be documented, The wisdom from the Iron age of the Indian subcontinent, The Vedas laid down the foundation in the areas of study, progress and expression for countless human advancements. 
 
 With each passing generation and the increasing ignorance of the human species, this invaluable knowledge is being lost in translation as it is documented in nothing more than a paragraph in middle-school textbooks. 
 
 What we fail to understand is that by investigating the knowledge and viewpoints in the many subjects within the Vedic culture we can certainly see that the practice and utilization of this knowledge can indeed assist us equally today as it did thousands of years ago. 
 
 The Indian Vedic School is the first of its kind website offering a wide range of Vedic courses and categories to study from. A platform for seekers and speakers to connect and learn the Vedic sciences and reap a conscious generation with the wisdom of our forefathers without prejudice of Caste, Creed, Nationality or Religion. 
 
 For the very first time, We are offering certifiable courses in various modules from the Vedic culture in an attempt to save revive this rare and dying knowledge. The Indian Vedic School is a global platform for humanity to benefit from the Vedas through introspection, spirituality and material development as it did in the past assisting us in our attempts to reach our higher potential.
 
 The Vedas hold a constant and higher nature of the power of Dharma that needs to be re-recognized and utilized to make this world a better place in these troubled times, Hence, The Indian Vedic School.

Music Therapy is an evidence-based, clinical use of music interventions to accomplish individualized goals by a professional who has completed an approved music therapy program. It has been proven to induce a therapeutic relationship between body and sound providing relief from various clinical ailments. Music is often associated to mood. Since the impact of music on a person’s mindset and well-being is unanimous, it’s no surprise that music therapy has been studied for the benefit of human beings not only soothingly, but also medically.
Welcome \n MANISH SURAPANENI \n Start Taking Courses!
